column2: UPDATE 1-Biogen's Alzheimer's drug slows mental decline in early study March 20 An experimental drug from Biogen Idec Inc became the  first Alzheimer's treatment to significantly slow cognitive decline and reduce what is believed to be brain-destroying plaque in patients with early and mild forms of the disease

column3: March 20 German financial market watchdog Bafin has imposed a 3.25 million euro ($3.47 million) fine - the regulator's largest ever - on investment manager BlackRock for publishing faulty corporate voting rights disclosures. ~

column2: UPDATE 4-Tiffany's sales fall for first time in 5 years on strong dollar March 20 Tiffany & Co's quarterly sales fell for the first time in five years and are expected to decline further as a strong dollar not only keeps tourists away from its flagship New York jewelry store but also reduces the value of sales overseas. ~REFILE-UPDATE 3-Tiffany's sales fall for first time in 5 years on strong dollar March 20 Tiffany & Co's quarterly sales fell for the first time in five years and are expected to decline further as a strong dollar not only keeps tourists away from its flagship New York jewelry store but also reduces the value of sales overseas. ~
